title: Project Teemo / Star guardian teemo / Emo-Teemo (eemo)
body:
https://i.imgur.com/yBGmR9V.jpg  Project teemo

https://i.imgur.com/Vk8QIQa.jpg  Eemo

https://i.imgur.com/tk7wWAo.jpg Star Guardian Teemo

replies.body: star guardian teemo feels more like a Willy Wonka teemo
yea i agree

Surprised Eemo isn't already a skin.

But honestly... with the last Super Galaxy skins that came out...
I would like one for Teemo.
ikr?
Bruh, you need a 4th option in the poll: All.
i don't think riot make 3 skins for the  same champios at once :D
They did 2 for blitzcrank, and he doesn't deserve it as much as ya boi Satan does.
oh yea

Tbh.... I think all of them are not really fitting ideas.
Emo Teemo maybe...

Project is a no go since all Project skins until now are human.

And Starguardian doesn't fit since it is about magical girls. Ezreal fits in since "pretty boy" (aka bishounen) is a trope in these shows. Teemo doesn't represent anything I know from magical girl series.

Starguardian Teemo is clearly a reference to Tuxedo Mask. Just give him a baton and have him throw down roses instead of shrooms and it'd be obvious.

Sure he isn't a character you'd traditionally expect in that role, but for a character like Teemo, that's what makes it work.
LOL OMG Star Guardian TF. Love it.

Don't know if sarcasm or serious.
{{sticker:sg-lulu}} 

In my opinion, TF is actually the perfect candidate for a Tuxedo Mask reference.
Tuxedo Mask wears a hat, so does TF. He throws roses, TF throws cards.
Tuxedo always appears in times of need out of nowhere, so does TF with his ult.
Tuxedo wears a cape, TF wears a coat they could easily change to a cape.
Both have a flirty personality.

He is the obvious choice for me.
teemo is cute , TF is  not
How could you possibly confuse that enthusiasm for sarcasm?
bro.. it's a game , everythink fits

No, not really.
Riot mentioned several times that their skins have inherent themes and their champion choices for it do have to match that.

That is the reason we will never see Starguardian Urgot being a thing. And the same goes for your Starguardian and Project Teemo. =/
there are wayyyy to many skins  that are 100% irrelevant with the lore

It's not about lore, skins are giving the champions a new lore along with it basically.

It's about "does the champion match the inherent criteria of a skin line?"

Example: Project
Project has the criteria that the champion has to be _human_ to get chosen for that skin line. Teemo does not match that, hence why he is ruled out.

Zed is a shadow????

Yi has like 12 eyes?

?????

Zed is a _human_ using shadow magic. Still human.

Yi is a human, he doesn't have 12 eyes, these are just goggles. In his old lore, these were hextech goggles built by Heimerdinger for him. Don't know how they are changing his lore with the Ionia update, but I guarantee you he will stay human, just like right now.

Sorry, but it is a fact that every champion in the Project line is indeed human.
{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}

this is 100% non logical .
those criteria shouldn't exist in video games and specially when designing something that will bring money.
Eemo, because I like clever word play.  And the pic reminds me of Robert Smith.
hahah ;p
They're all amazing... but PROJECT all the way.
it's awesome isn't it ? :D
eemo the best

I love the star guardian skin and eemo but as much as i love teemo the star guardian skins are fine for now but he should have a star guardian skin or a yordle teemo skin and riot should  make a fiddle (violin) fiddlesticks
satan already has satan satan so isn't he set?

Project are only human ,riot stopped doing emo and goth skins ,ew
Do you actually play the game or just post on the boards? You seem to play bots once in a while
WHeres the "kill it with fire" vote option?

NO MORE TEEMO SKINS!!!!

neat ideas tho...
no
disgusting
